channel.title: Rust on TheAbyss
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on TheAbyss

item.title: Cargo new Hello_Rust_World
item.description: Intro As one of my goals this year, I put down learning a systems language. My reasons besides really stretching my programming language skills include programming a micro controller as well as building a simple plartform neutral game. Lets face it the wild wild west of javascript has been very kind to me but time to push myself into something more strongly typed. The Mission So having read the documentation, I will attempt to follow this multi-step tutorial Learn Rust With Entirely Too Many Linked Lists and see if we can learn enough to program our first board or the next minecraft
